ygData.subject: Re: Question about the Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: What did you *pay* for it though?  Or did you get it off a mob yourself? Jason A. Farqu├® CDI at http://www.pigging.com/ ... From: John Kim
ygData.messageBody:
What did you *pay* for it though? Or did you get it off a mob yourself?

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question about the Battle Drum


> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
> >
> > I must have missed it earlier but what are the stats on the battle drum?
I
> > think I remember reading that it increased your speed while playing Selos
> > but I haven't seen any other bonuses it confers. What other songs does it
> > also improve?
>
> The speed increase I've seen is roughly 5%-10% over a normal
> drum. It also enhances the Rhythm series of songs
> (percussion) by about 20% (e.g. +38 resist points becomes
> +46). I haven't tested it with other percussion songs.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
